caption: A man drops into a balcony, and he enter a house. He finds that there’s no man in the house, and he is searching for something. At last, he finds a secret room, and in which is a man lying on the bed, he has a gun in his hand. After a while, policemen arrive and have a conversation with the man. At the same time, a man and a woman are saying something, and then the man goes to somewhere and knock a door, but he gets no reply, so he writes a note and pushes it into the house. Also at the same time, a different man is seeking for a job.

global.question: How many characters appears in this video
global.answer: There're eight people in the video.

How many man and woman appears in the video?
global.answer: There're five men and three women in the video.
